attributes.action: explain bulgarias acceptance to the EU despite not meeting the acceptance criteria regarding human rights, as exposed by Kate Blewitt and BBC4
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why was it left up to the bbc to inform the country of the systematic abuse, neglect and murder of Bulgarian children in institutions.Why was Bulgaria allowed to join the EU without meeting the acceptance criteria regarding human rights and the protection of minorities.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
